Introduction to FlightDeck

The basic idea of flightdeck is to let users below powerful interactive dashboards by composing widgets into panels, organizing them on a page and assembling them into a dashboard.

You can create a simple dashboard in seven lines of code!

library(flightdeck)
library(htmltools)
fdBoard(
  fdHeader(title = 'My Board'),
  fdSidebar(p("Hello World!")),
  fdBody()
)

To learn more about how to build dashboards using flighdeck, read the tutorial.

Developed by Ramnath Vaidyanathan, .
